Introducing ColorHub

Find the perfect color palette for your next project.

Pick a palette, edit and preview it, and paste the code snippet into your project... it's that simple!

What To Do

How to use ColorHub

Step One

Select a Palette

To get started, simply select one of our pre-made palettes.

Step Two

Edit & Preview

Customise it so it's perfect for your project, and see how it looks on a variety of common layouts.

Step Three

Export CSS

ColorHub generates CSS, Sass or Tailwind snippets you can post directly into your codebase..
